Class RESTUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.naturalis.oaipmh.rest.RESTUtil

  • public class RESTUtil
extends Object
    Provides common functionality for the REST service.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String dump(Object bean)
      Returns a print-out of the specified object.
      static Response plainTextResponse(int status, String message)
      Generates a response with the specified HTTP status code, the specified message in the reponse body and a Content-Type header of text/plain.
      static Response plainTextResponse(String message)
      Generates a 200 (OK) response with the specified message in the response body and a Content-Type header of text/plain.
      static Response serverError(String message)
      Generates an HTTP response with status 500 (INTERNAL SERVER ERROR) and the specified message in the response body.
      static Response serverError(Throwable t)
      Generates an HTTP response with status 500 (INTERNAL SERVER ERROR) and the stack trace of the root cause of the specified exception in the response body.
      static Response serverError(Throwable t, String message)
      Generates an HTTP response with status 500 (INTERNAL SERVER ERROR) and the specified message and the stack trace of the root cause of the specified exception in the response body.
      static Response xmlResponse(Object jaxbObject)
      Generate a 200 (OK) response with a Content-Type header of application/xml and the specified JAXB object converted to XML in the response body.
      static Response xmlResponse(StreamingOutput stream)
      Generate a 200 (OK) response with a Content-Type header of application/xml and the specified XML string in the response body.
      static Response xmlResponse(String xml)
      Generate a 200 (OK) response with a Content-Type header of application/xml and the specified XML string in the response body.

        public static Response serverError(String message)
